title: Tony Blair – 2021 Comments on His Knighthood
author: admin
summary: The comments made by Sir Tony Blair on 31 December 2021.
content: It is an immense honour to be appointed Knight Companion of the Most Noble Order of the Garter, and I am deeply grateful to Her Majesty the Queen.

It was a great privilege to serve as prime minister and I would like to thank all those who served alongside me, in politics, public service and all parts of our society, for their dedication and commitment to our country.
